description: React component for displaying and managing caption panels, including caption variations, status updates, and user interactions.

methods.name: variationLabelKey
methods.description: Determines the label key for caption variation types based on the variation type.

methods.name: CaptionsPanel
methods.description: Main React component that displays a panel of captions with status, editing, and approval functionalities.

methods.name: CaptionCard
methods.description: Subcomponent for rendering individual caption details, editing textarea, and action buttons.
